solution_line_template: The total amount of money that she lost is ${lost_on_roulette}+${lost_on_blackjack} = $<<{lost_on_roulette}+{lost_on_blackjack}={total_lost_money}>>{total_lost_money}
If she remained with ${total_lost_money}, she initially had ${total_lost_money}+${remaining_money} = $<<{total_lost_money}+{remaining_money}={initial_money}>>{initial_money}
